text: Autofilled save prompt entry box stripped of "json/" and ".json"
Switch color schemes - would require some kind of global widget manager that can "refresh" all widgets
Prevent Text widget from cutting off words
"To-do list" entries with checkboxes, once you check them they get crossed out
Highlight text in input_path entry box by default
Distinguish between "save" and "save as" (the former doesn't prompt you to enter a filename, but only when there's already a "last filepath" string saved)
Sort entries alphabetically or by user-defined ranking
Export individual entries or groups of entries to a text file or to the clipboard
Dropdown selector instead of entry box for loading files
Insert an entry at a particular position instead of at the end (cmd+i)
Other formatting options: color, weight, italics, size
add tags to entries and filter entries by tag
Get entry stats - entry count, word count, character count, etc.
